entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
